textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Australian brand MINKPINK was launched 2005 by designer Rachel Evans. Founded on a philosophy of embracing individuality, the brand offers style-conscious, yet playful options for the everyday girl. Evans pulls inspiration from Sydney street style and the sun-soaked beaches of her home base, resulting in the signature lighthearted aesthetic of MINKPINK apparel.
